contents.content: Pick your race and where your character comes from.
Decide how your character grew up.
Pick from one of the available classes.
You may need to pick a specialisation, such as a Sorcerer's bloodline or Cleric's domain.
Perception
Fortitude
Reflex
Will
Add up the ability score bonuses you get:
Several +2 or -2 from your ancestry.
Optionally, take a -2 flaw in two abilities to gain a +2 boost in one other. This may not take your ancestry bonus above +2 or below -2.
One +2 from your background.
Several +2 from your class.
Free +2 to any four abilities
Calculate your hit points. Some of these come from your ancestry, and some each level from your class and constitution modifier.
Your proficiencies at level 1 are: 0, 3, 5, 7 and 9. They increase as you level up.
Work out what your character owns at the start of the game, including clothes and weapons.
Ability Modifier = (Ability Score - 10) ÷ 2
You must take three archetype feats before you can start another.
You cannot have more than one prestige archetype.
Master in skills
Legendary in skills
Raise shield
Never flat-footed against creatures of a lower level.
Master at Fortitude saves
When you succeed at a Fortitude save, treat it as a critical success.
Legendary at Fortitude saves
When you critically fail a Fortitude save, treat it as a failure. When you fail a Fortitude save against an effect that deals damage, you halve the damage you take.
Expert at simple and martial weapons, and unarmed attacks
Master at Will saves
When you succeed at a Will save, treat it as a critical success.
If you succeed at a melee Strike against a target with resistance against the physical damage type of the weapon or unarmed attack you’re using, reduce that resistance.
After raging, you are fatigued for 1 round.
While raging, cannot use actions that require concentration, except for Seek.
To melee and unarmed strikes
Gain critical specialization for your melee weapon or unarmed attack.
Use one of your rage actions as a free action.
Don’t become fatigued after you stop raging. It still takes the normal amount of time before you can use Rage again.
1000 coins = 1 bulk
